TextView.android:text:
You can use it to share or transfer files without internet and manage all of your files in one place with File Manger.
Features -
1. Share multiple content from your video, photo, music and applications.
2. Share with a max speed up to 25MB/s.
3. No internet connection is required: setup a hotspot and connect to it using QR code.
4. Share folders as they are for backup and other purposes.
5. Light UI: Works faster even on low-end devices.
6. Speed-oriented: optimized for speed
5. Dark Mode : Save your phone's battery and also your Beautiful Eyes by using Dark Mode.
